item.title: Tips for Building Practical ML Models for BCI
About Me
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I am a data scientist, machine learning engineer, algorithm developer in neuraltech and healthtech areas. I have also been an academic researcher for over 10 years. I have extensive experiences in electrophysiological signal processing, brain-computer interfacing and cognitive and clinical research. My goal is to leverage my skills to make the world a healthier place. This blog is my memorandum of what I have learned through my research activities.
